description: This file defines an abstract base class 'Storage' for session storage management, including methods for creating, reading, updating, deleting, and schema upgrading of session data, with mode configuration.

classes.name: Storage
classes.description: An abstract base class for session storage implementations, supporting different modes ('agent', 'team', 'workflow') and defining essential session management methods.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the Storage with an optional mode parameter, defaulting to 'agent'.

methods.name: mode
methods.description: Property getter for the storage mode.

methods.name: mode
methods.description: Property setter for the storage mode.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Abstract method to create a new storage.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Abstract method to read a session by session_id and optional user_id.

methods.name: get_all_session_ids
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve all session IDs, optionally filtered by user_id or agent_id.

methods.name: get_all_sessions
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve all sessions, optionally filtered by user_id or entity_id.

methods.name: get_recent_sessions
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve recent sessions with an optional limit.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Abstract method to insert or update a session.

methods.name: delete_session
methods.description: Abstract method to delete a session by session_id.

methods.name: drop
methods.description: Abstract method to drop or clear the storage.

methods.name: upgrade_schema
methods.description: Abstract method to upgrade the storage schema.
